game.name: Enlisted
game.genres: Action, Massively Multiplayer, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: Enlisted 에서는 한 명의 병사가 아닌 한 분대를 지휘할 수 있습니다! 분대 기반 MMO 게임인 Enlisted 는 20세기에 벌어진 가장 치열했던 전투를 배경으로 하고 있으며 수 백명의 병사와 전차, 그리고 항공기가 펼치는 전투를 경험할 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Enlisted, you are not only commanding a single soldier, but an entire squad! This MMO squad based shooter recreates the key battles of the bloodiest war of the 20th century, with hundreds of soldiers, tanks and aircraft taking part in each battle.

reviewHighlights.text: played with my ex. was fun untill we broke up. now im playing it with a randum bulgarian dude. yea for a free game its actually really good
[h2] I've played >500 hours of this game in 2025 alone, I think that says what you need to know. [/h2] If you'd like to read more, I'll go into it: [h...
